articles.title: Molly Goddard Launches Bridal With 12 Other-Worldly Wedding Dresses - Vogue.com
articles.description: Molly Goddard, London’s queen of tulle, has launched 12 wedding dresses with room for customisation. The Molly Goddard bridal price range, from £1,800 for simpler wedding dress styles to £10,000 for the ornate bridal pieces, opens up Molly Goddard bridal to a…
articles.content: Its no surprise that Molly Goddard, Londons queen of tulle, has been eyeing a move into bridalwear for some time. At Goddards pared-back but utterly joyful spring 2021 show, the designer told British… [+3101 chars]
